mapper.select: select hs_goods_code from web_specification_values where value_id = #{valueId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select TOP 1 A.* from web_specification_values as A left join web_products_specifications_values_link as b on A.value_id=B.value_id where B.product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by A.hs_goods_price asc
select A.* from web_specification_values as A left join web_products_specifications_values_link as b on A.value_id=B.value_id where B.product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select A.hs_goods_code from web_specification_values as A left join web_products_specifications_values_link as b on A.value_id=B.value_id where B.product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select hs_goods_code from web_specification_values where value_id = #{valueId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select A.* from web_specification_values as A left join web_products_specifications_values_link as B on A.specification_id=b.specification_id and A.value_id=B.value_id where B.product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and B.value_id = #{valueId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: delete from web_specification_values where value_id in (select value_id from web_products_specifications_values_link where product_id=#{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.insert: insert into web_specification_values (value_id, specification_id, value, hs_goods_code, hs_goods_price,hs_stock,pre_price,promotion_price,start_time,end_time,vip_price) values (#{valueId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{specificationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hsGoodsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hsGoodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hsStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{promotionPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{vipPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},)

specification_id = #{specificationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
value = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hs_goods_code = #{hsGoodsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hs_goods_price = #{hsGoodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where value_id = #{valueId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
